ai-vb16:353.1_0: What is that the Realized One truly knows the possible as possible, and the impossible as impossible?
ai-vb16:353.2_0: “It’s impossible for a person accomplished in view to take any condition as permanent. That is not possible.”
ai-vb16:353.3_0: “It’s possible for an ordinary person to take some condition as permanent.”
ai-vb16:353.4_0: “It’s impossible for a person accomplished in view to take any condition as pleasant.”
ai-vb16:353.5_0: But it’s possible for an ordinary person to take some condition as pleasant.”
ai-vb16:353.6_0: “It’s impossible for a person accomplished in view to take anything as beneficial.”
ai-vb16:353.7_0: “It’s possible for an ordinary person to take something as beneficial.”
ai-vb16:353.8_0: “It’s impossible for a person accomplished in view to murder their mother.”
ai-vb16:353.9_0: But it’s possible for an ordinary person to murder their mother.”
ai-vb16:354.1_0: “It’s impossible for a person accomplished in view to murder their father ... or murder a perfected one.
ai-vb16:354.3_0: Or they’d cause a schism in the Realized One. ...
ai-vb16:354.5_0: Or else the teacher should acknowledge another teacher.
ai-vb16:354.6_0: They understand this spiritual path, it’s impossible.”
ai-vb16:354.7_0: But it’s possible for an ordinary person to maintain the eight respects.”

ai-vb16:355.3_0: “It’s impossible for two wheel-turning monarchs to arise in the same solar system at the same time.”
ai-vb16:355.4_0: But it is possible for just one wheel-turning monarch to arise in one solar system.”
ai-vb16:356.1_0: “It’s impossible for a woman to be a perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha.”

ai-vb16:378.1_0: What are the sentient beings insignificant?
ai-vb16:378.2_0: These ten grounds for qualifications for graduation have not developed and cultivated.
ai-vb16:379.1_0: What are the sentient beings who are faculty?
ai-vb16:379.3_0: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, and immersion.
ai-vb16:379.4_0: When those five faculties have not developed and cultivated, they’re very fruitful and beneficial, and they have come to their faculties.
ai-vb16:380.1_0: What are the sentient beings who are crossing over?
ai-vb16:380.2_0: When those sentient beings who have developed and cultivated they are abide in these seven faculties, and they have gone beyond the faculties of desire.
ai-vb16:381.1_0: What are the sentient beings among who are most seven eons?
ai-vb16:381.2_0: Those who to be freed by bad, unwholesome qualities—being up with the Great faculties, with bad friends, respect, revere, and venerate them.
ai-vb16:382.1_0: What are the sentient beings who have lost their heart?
ai-vb16:382.2_0: Those who’ve good practice and good practice, who’s good at ease, and some sentient beings who’ve transcended good qualities.
ai-vb16:383.1_0: What sentient beings didn’t make things hard to understand?
ai-vb16:383.2_0: And those beings who only used to be asking for too long,
ai-vb16:383.3_0: And those beings who side with well-known to ask for wood.
ai-vb16:384.1_0: What are the sentient beings that should be seen?
ai-vb16:384.2_0: But those who had hungry, conversed by result, and by deeds, whose faith, conscience, prudence, energy, and wisdom. They’re witless, not stupid.
ai-vb16:385.1_0: What are the sentient beings that should be scared?
ai-vb16:385.2_0: Those who don’t have the same deeds with cause or reason, not the results of good deeds with deeds. Being reconciles. They’re wise, bright, and clever. These dear beings, however. These don’t look down on them.
ai-vb16:385.3_0: And the wisdom where right view is loved by that right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-vb16:385.4_0: The Realized One truly understands the faculties of other sentient beings and other individuals after comprehending them with his mind.
ai-vb16:386.1_0: And what is that the Realized One truly knows corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments?
ai-vb16:386.3_0: There are some who practice absorption meditation for attaining free of bowls: they dwell in only because they are according to seniority, and like their practice absorption meditation.
ai-vb16:386.4_0: These are the four ways of practice.
ai-vb16:387.2_0: There is a meditator who is skilled in they emerge from. And they emerge from the slow, emerge from the wood; and from the force they practice absorption meditation.
ai-vb16:387.3_0: These are the four ways of practice.
ai-vb16:388.2_0: There is meditator skilled in immersion but not in entering it.
ai-vb16:388.3_0: There is a meditator who is skilled in immersion but not in entering it.
ai-vb16:388.4_0: There is a meditator skilled in immersion and in entering it.
ai-vb16:388.5_0: There is a meditator who is skilled neither in immersion nor in entering it.
ai-vb16:388.6_0: These are the four ways of practice.
ai-vb16:389.3_0: the first absorption, the second absorption, the third absorption, the fourth absorption.
ai-vb16:390.3_0: Having physical form, they see visions.
ai-vb16:391.1_0: Not perceiving physical form internally, they see visions externally.
ai-vb16:393.1_0: Going totally beyond perceptions of form, with the ending of perceptions of impingement, not focusing on perceptions of diversity, aware that “space is infinite”, they enter and remain in the dimension of infinite space.
ai-vb16:394.1_0: Going totally beyond the dimension of infinite space, aware that ‘consciousness is infinite’, they enter and remain in the dimension of infinite consciousness.
ai-vb16:395.1_0: Going totally beyond the dimension of infinite consciousness, aware that ‘there is nothing at all’, they enter and remain in the dimension of nothingness.
ai-vb16:396.1_0: Going totally beyond the dimension of nothingness, they enter and remain in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-vb16:397.1_0: Going totally beyond the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, they enter and remain in the cessation of perception and feeling.
ai-vb16:398.3_0: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected.
ai-vb16:399.3_0: Attainment through the dimension of infinite space, the third absorption, the fourth absorption, the attainment of the dimension of infinite space, the dimension of infinite consciousness, the dimension of nothingness, and the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-vb16:400.4_0: And from that state of immersion they emerge from that state.
ai-vb16:400.5_0: And the wisdom where right view is loved by that right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-vb16:400.6_0: This is the Realized One that has truly known corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments.
ai-vb16:401.1_0: What is that the Realized One truly knows of past lives?
ai-vb16:401.2_0: They recollect many kinds of past lives, that is,
ai-vb16:401.3_0: one, two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths; many eons of the world contracting, many eons of the world expanding, many eons of the world contracting and expanding.
ai-vb16:401.4_0: This was how I felt pleasure and pain, and that was how my life ended. When I passed away from that place I was reborn somewhere else. There, too, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food.
ai-vb16:401.5_0: There, too, I was named this, my clan was that, I looked like this, and that was my food. This was how I felt pleasure and pain, and that was how my life ended. When I passed away from that place I was reborn here.’ And so they recollect their many kinds of past lives, with features and details.
ai-vb16:401.6_0: And the wisdom where right view is loved by that right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-vb16:401.7_0: This is the recollection of past lives.
ai-vb16:402.1_0: What is that the Realized One’s knowledge of the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings?
ai-vb16:402.2_0: With clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, the Realized One sees sentient beings passing away and being reborn—inferior and superior, beautiful and ugly, in a good place or a bad place. He understands how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-vb16:402.3_0: “These beings who engaged in misconduct by body, speech, and mind, who abused the noble ones, who had wrong views and acted accordingly,
ai-vb16:402.4_0: They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-vb16:402.5_0: ‘These dear beings did bad things by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-vb16:402.6_0: They spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they chose to act out of that wrong view.
ai-vb16:402.7_0: They never spoke ill of the noble ones; they had right view; and they chose to act out of that right view. When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.’ And so, with clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman, they see sentient beings passing away and being reborn—inferior and superior, beautiful and ugly, in a good place or a bad place. They understand how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds.
ai-vb16:402.8_0: And the wisdom where right view is loved by that right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-vb16:402.9_0: the Realized One truly understands the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings.
ai-vb16:403.2_0: And a Realized One has realized the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life. And he lives having realized it with his own insight due to the ending of defilements.
ai-vb16:403.3_0: And the wisdom where right view is loved by that right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-vb16:403.4_0: The Realized One truly understands the ending of defilements.
ai-vb16:405.1_0: The analysis of knowledge is finished.
